page.title: 17Tourism in Pennington
page.content: Swarthmoor Hall Many people visit Swarthmoor Hall during the summer months.When I went after being in the sunshine my eyes had to get use to dark looking house. They dining room was beautiful and there are many interesting features likes the funny bearded jars. You can look as much as you like but you will never find another four poster Newell post like the one at Swarthmoor Hall. The trip-step on the stairs is very interesting.Quakers come from the USA to visit Swarthmoor Hall.Many years ago,Quakers fled to Pennsylvania and they return to visit the Hall.Some vistors enjoy walking on the fells in and around Pennington.The anicent stocks at the gate of Pennington Church are often photographed as people enjoy their visit to the church
